thread.title: Kemper Corporation Announces Schedule for First Quarter 2018 Earnings Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Kemper Corporation Announces Schedule for First Quarter 2018 Earnings Call

organizations.name: kemper corporation announces schedule for first

text:
CHICAGO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Kemper Corporation (NYSE: KMPR) announced today that before the markets open on Monday, April 30, 2018, Kemper will issue its first quarter 2018 earnings release and financial supplement and will also file its quarterly report on Form 10-Q with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the “SEC”). Following their publication, these documents will be available on the investor section of kemper.com .
Kemper will host its conference call to discuss first quarter 2018 results on Monday, April 30, 2018, at 4:15 p.m. Eastern (3:15 p.m. Central). The conference call will be accessible via the internet and by telephone at 844.826.3041. To listen via webcast, register online at the investor section of kemper.com at least 15 minutes prior to the webcast to install any necessary software.
A replay of the webcast will be available online at the investor section of kemper.com .
About Kemper
The Kemper family of companies is one of the nation’s leading insurers. With $8 billion in assets, Kemper is improving the world of insurance by offering personalized solutions for individuals, families and businesses. Kemper's businesses collectively:
Offer insurance for home, auto, life, health and valuables Service six million policies Are represented by 20,000 agents and brokers Employ 5,550 associates dedicated to providing exceptional service Are licensed to sell insurance in 50 states and the District of Columbia
Learn more about Kemper .
